languages.text: "Дом Версериан, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, безмерно рад оказанной ему чести представить вас подданным и смиренно благодарит вас".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Версериан, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, безмерно рад оказанной ему чести представить вас подданным и смиренно благодарит вас".

languages.text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."
languages.original_text: "Дом Версериан, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, безмерно рад оказанной ему чести представить вас подданным и смиренно благодарит вас".

traits.locale_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honor of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."
"House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honor of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."
"House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."
"House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."
"House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。陛下を臣民にご紹介できるとは身に余る光栄です。謹んでお礼申し上げます」
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。陛下を臣民にご紹介できるとは身に余る光栄です。謹んでお礼申し上げます」

languages.text: “您已授权让韦尔森家族负责本次庆典。韦尔森家族心怀无上荣幸，将您引见给您的臣民，并向您表示谦卑的感谢。”
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: “您已授权让韦尔森家族负责本次庆典。韦尔森家族心怀无上荣幸，将您引见给您的臣民，并向您表示谦卑的感谢。”

languages.text: «La casa Werserian, responsable de organizar los festejos por decisión suya, agradece humildemente y con gran alegría el haber sido elegida para el honor de presentarle ante sus súbditos».
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Werserian, responsable de organizar los festejos por decisión suya, agradece humildemente y con gran alegría el haber sido elegida para el honor de presentarle ante sus súbditos».

languages.text: « La maison Werserian, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, se réjouit de s'être vue confier l'honneur de vous présenter à vos sujets et vous offre ses plus humbles remerciements. »
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Werserian, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, se réjouit de s'être vue confier l'honneur de vous présenter à vos sujets et vous offre ses plus humbles remerciements. »

languages.text: "Das Haus Werserian, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, ist sehr erfreut über die Ehre, Euch Euren Untertanen vorzustellen, und dankt Euch demütig."
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Werserian, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, ist sehr erfreut über die Ehre, Euch Euren Untertanen vorzustellen, und dankt Euch demütig."

languages.text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Werserian Hanesi, sizi tebaanızla tanıştırma şerefine nail olduğu için pek memnun olup naçizane teşekkürlerini iletiyor."
languages.original_text: "House Werserian, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, is overjoyed at having received the honour of introducing you to your subjects and humbly thanks you."

traits.locale_text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Werserian Hanesi, sizi tebaanızla tanıştırma şerefine nail olduğu için pek memnun ve naçizane teşekkürlerini iletiyor."
